backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing per-user daily follower lists with access control checks for querying and saving.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a feature request to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining global CSS variables and dark mode values used across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the notebook page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that manages Internet Identity login/logout and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter and save their display name before using the app.
frontend/src/components/FollowerListEdit: Component for adding, editing, and removing follower names in a numbered list.
frontend/src/components/LoadSaveStatus.t: UI helper showing loading skeletons, error alerts, or saving indicators for follower data operations.
frontend/src/components/NotebookPage.tsx: Page component managing date selection, follower list state, loading/saving, and unsaved change tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyFollowers.ts: Provides query and mutation hooks for fetching and saving daily follower lists using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines hooks to get and update the caller’s user profile based on roles using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom notebook‑themed color variables, backgrounds, and component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Utility functions for formatting and normalizing dates to ISO strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables used in the project.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and notebook‑style theme variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including implemented features for a notebook‑style daily follower list app and notes about issues with deploying the Great Follower Wall feature. Includes architectural notes, known issues, and metadata for existing features.
